com.kilvish.view

Class GamePane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.kilvish.view.GamePane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GamePane
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A container to which Sprites can be added to make a game. This is the de-facto game container. Extend to write your own game.
    Author:
    Divyansh Prakash
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • pause

        public void pause(boolean paused)
        Pause/Unpause this game.

      • play

        public void play()
        Start this game. Use pause(false) to unpause a game.

        public boolean isPaused()
        Tests if this game is paused.

        public static boolean isKeyDown(int key)
        Method to check if a key is pressed. Takes the KeyEvent.keyCode as input parameter.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method is called again and again by the system. Override to implement functionality.

      • setFPS

        public void setFPS(int fps)
        Will make the engine update the game fps times every second. Not exact. FPS=Frames per second

        Returns the frame-rate of the game.
